name: Green Orbital
description:
The rings of a far off planet have always fascinated me and sparked my imagination. There was something so unreal about the bands that orbited the planets, something made up, something of the imagination. I have tried to capture that thought with this necklace.

A thick ring of copper orbits around a simple glass bead in a stand out, grass green. The contrast of the green and the aged copper make this a classy and completely unique necklace. The ring and bead measure 1 inch in diameter and hang from a 18 inch, antiqued brass chain. The necklace closes with an antiqued brass hook.

Each item is made to order. While the metals and beads are the same, the patina on the copper can differ slightly than what is pictured.

The rings of a far off planet have always fascinated me and sparked my imagination. There was something so unreal about the bands that orbited the planets, something made up, something of the imagination. I have tried to capture that thought with this necklace.

Each item is made to order. While the metals and beads are the same, the patina on the copper can differ slightly than what is pictured.

name: Crystal Orbital
description:
The rings of a far off planet have always fascinated me and sparked my imagination. There was something so unreal about the bands that orbited the planets, something made up, something of the imagination. I have tried to capture that thought with this necklace.

A thick ring of copper orbits around a simple crystal clear, glass bead. The contrast of the clear bead and the aged copper make this a classy and completely unique necklace. The ring and bead measure 1 inch in diameter and hang from a 18 inch, antiqued brass chain. The necklace closes with an antiqued brass hook.

Each item is made to order. While the metals and beads are the same, the patina on the copper can differ slightly than what is pictured.

name: Woodland Stream
description:
Some of my most peaceful moments are found while strolling down a woodland path along side of a bubbling woodland stream. The soft sounds of a trickling stream blend beautifully with the bright sounds of woodland birds creating a haven to clear your thoughts in. This bracelet captures that most peaceful feeling.

This unique bracelet is hand knit from copper tone wire, semi-precious beads, bead chips, wooden and glass beads in browns, blues, greens and clear.

Bracelet measures 7 inches around and can be lengthened or shortened per buyers request at time of purchase.

Each item is made to order. Pattern of colors may differ slightly from picture but I do my best to match exactly. Beads and wire are the same.

name: Dusty Rose
description:
Deep pinks and copper always makes me think of the jewelry I used to see in my grandma's jewelry box. This bracelet brings those colors up a few decades and puts an edge on them.

This unique bracelet is hand knit from copper wire, a blend of brown, copper, and varied pink Czech glass beads, and clear glass beads.

Bracelet measures 7 inches around and can be lengthened or shortened slightly per buyer's request at time of purchase.

Each item is made to order. Pattern of colors may differ slightly from picture but I do my best to match exactly. Beads and wire are the same.
